participant_1.background:
I write poetry and play guitar to process my emotions.
I like to do my laundry on the weekends when I have more time.
I'm my own boss.
I need to keep my stock market reports organized.
I watch funny movies to cheer myself up.

I'm more concerned with my character than my appearance.
my college courses are on philosophy and history.

content.text: Good! Just finished helping my student pick out an outfit for an event.
Oh nice! I'm not really into fashion. I like to write poetry and play guitar to process my emotions.
That's cool! I'm more concerned with my character than my appearance.
Me too. I like to think that I am a good person.
What are you studying in college?
I'm a business major. I want to be my own boss one day.
That's cool. I'm a history and philosophy major.
I like existentialism. It's all about the meaning of life and existence.
That sounds interesting. I'll have to look into it.
I have a lot of favorite rocks. I have a collection of rocks that remind me of the places I've been and the people I've met.
That's cool! I've never thought about collecting rocks.
